name: Marinated Pepper And Zucchini-Slaw Topping
recipeCategory: condiments, pizza and calzones, salads and dressings
keywords: balsamic vinegar, basil, lemon juice, red bell pepper, zucchini
recipeIngredient: 3 roasted red peppers, skinned, seeded, cut into 1/4-inch-wide strips
1 tablespoon thinly sliced fresh basil leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the vinegar, olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon of salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add the peppers and toss to coat with the marinade. Let stand at least 1 hour. Drain.
In a small bowl, toss together the zucchini, lemon juice, remaining salt and pepper.
When ready to assemble, top the pizza first with the marinated peppers and then with the zucchini slaw. Sprinkle with the Parmesan and basil and serve. Use on roasted garlic and rosemary crust.
